name: MarchingCubes Islands v0.1
description:
Have you ever wanted your own tropical island? Well now you can with this procedural Island downloadable exe!

Procedural Islands uses the Marching cubes algorithm along with destructable voxelised terrain.

editing the terrain is slow and something I would like to work on.

Controls: 

wasd to move space to jump

left and right mouse click to edit terrain.

"E" to open terrain settings menu.

"G" to quickly generate a new island.

"Left alt" enter fly mode.

Assets used:

all assets used are available for free on the unity asset store

Low Poly Tree Pack by BrokenVector

Low Poly Rock Pack by BrokenVector

Toony Skies by Arkham Interactive

Mini First Person Controller by Vitefait
